Preprocessing Info.pre_detailed_instructions: When loading the File Equivalent Tables, retrieve and parse from file name

fields.target_attribute: - Library Item Source Aleph Library Name
- Library Item Update LMS Staff Account Identifier
- Library Item Process Status Update Date

data_quality_checks.instructions: First charcter must not contain a space

fields.target_attribute: - Library Item Location Call Number Scheme Code

Transformation Info.action_detailed_instructions: Look up description based on Z30_call_no_type

fields.target_attribute: - Library Item Location Call Number Scheme Description

Preprocessing Info.pre_detailed_instructions:
1. Replace the following strings with a space: $$h, $$i, $$j, $$k, $$l, $$m
2. Remove leading and trailing spaces.

fields.target_attribute: - Library Item Location Sort Normalized Call Number
- Library Item Location Temporary Designation Flag
- Library Item Location Alternative Call Number Scheme Code

Transformation Info.action_detailed_instructions: Look up description based on Z30_call_no_2_type

fields.target_attribute: - Library Item Location Alternative Call Number Scheme Description

Preprocessing Info.pre_detailed_instructions:
1. Replace the following strings with a space: $$h, $$i, $$j, $$k, $$l, $$m
2. Remove leading and trailing spaces.

fields.target_attribute: - Library Item Location Alternative Call Number
- Library Item Location Alternative Sort Normalized Call Number
- Library Item Alternate Enumeration Level 1 Text
- Library Item Alternate Enumeration Level 2 Text
- Library Item Actual Material Form Code
- Library Item Actual Process Status Code

Transformation Info.action_detailed_instructions:
FOR Insert trigger in Z35:
IF Z35-EVENT-TYPE = 50|52|54|56|91
     identify relevant item {
       JOIN 
         Z35_REC_KEY = SUBSTR(Z30_REC_KEY,1,9) AND
         Z35_ITEM_SEQUENCE = SUBSTR(Z30_REC_KEY,10,15)
         }
     update value
ELSE 
     do nothing
